name: Raisin Run
description:
Hello!!,this is the game that I created for the 2d shooter project .The game is called raisin run, the main player is a cookie that is running from / defeating the raisins.

Modifications:

1-the player ,the enemies, and all of the sprite assets were changes according to the new theme of the game(including the death animation for both the player and the enemies).

2- all sound effects and music were changed to match the game.

3- I created a new script called lives to display how many lives are left for the player

credits:

created by shoug alarifi

note: all of the music and sound effects used are royalty free.

sound effects source:
